title: Four Seasons Offers Once-in-a-Lifetime 2015 FORMULA 1 SINGAPORE AIRLINES SINGAPORE GRAND PRIX Experience
text:
Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts
Exclusive ten night, three destination Ultimate Celebration Package for two includes VIP access to the night race on September 20
TORONTO , Sept. 1, Get set for the Ultimate Celebration Package from Four Seasons: an intimately customisable five-property adventure that interweaves tropical island escapism with electrifying VIP-access to the world's only full FORMULA 1 night race .
"For just one lucky pair, we've created a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to experience the excitement of FORMULA 1 night racing during an exclusive ten-day journey through five Four Seasons hotels and resorts in three spectacular destinations," says Michael A. Crawford , President, Asia Pacific , Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts.
Exclusively available to the first caller only , the Ultimate Celebration Package is one part of the ongoing series of Four Seasons Extraordinary Experiences . This package spans from the cultural and spiritual embrace of Bali to the verve and vibrancy of FORMULA 1-gripped Singapore during the country's 50th anniversary of independence, before concluding in blissful abandon on the dream-like beaches of the Maldives .
Three Nights in Bali – September 15-18, 2015
Four Seasons Resorts in Bali make for the ultimate pre-race escape. Reconnect with self and surroundings with AntiGravity Yoga, meditation, healing Chakra rituals, Life Talks and Ubud's graceful charm at the sacred hillside haven of Four Seasons Resort Bali at Sayan . Then, immerse in the oceanfront chic of Four Seasons Resort Bali at Jimbaran Bay , an all-villa beach retreat where Bali's finest Cooking Academy, surf school and temple-adorned setting share the island's traditions and innovations at their magical best.
Four Nights in Singapore – September 18-22, 2015
Pulsating with the energy of its Golden Jubilee celebrations, the Lion City welcome roars to life with four nights of butler and chauffeur service at the impeccable Four Seasons Hotel Singapore . Memorable cuisine and helicopter city tours culminate in a VIP table seating reserved table during the world's most intoxicating FORMULA 1 race. Experience the exhilaration of Asia's only night street circuit race, then enjoy VIP-access to the star-studded Amber Lounge after-party followed by VIP Deck concert passes.
Three Nights in the Maldives – September 22-25, 2015
After the exhilaration of race fever, return business class airplane tickets to the Maldives await. Here, clear turquoise waters, pristine white beaches, a sandbank dinner and a champagne cruise set the scene for a dream of pure tranquillity. Stay one night in a two-bedroom Water Suite in the traditional village-like surrounds of Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Kuda Huraa , followed by two nights in a two-bedroom Water Suite at the sister island of Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Landaa Giraavaru , a sublime natural wilderness located in the remote Baa Atoll UNESCO World Biosphere Reserve, just a short seaplane ride from Kuda Huraa.
Ultimate Celebration Package Details
Coupled with customised world-class service, Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts offers an unsurpassable FORMULA 1 experience that guarantees to be exceptional in every way. The Ultimate Celebration Package is available from USD 100,000 for two. For package inclusions, click here .
Reservation is by phone directly to the Office of the President of Four Seasons Asia Pacific from Friday, September 4, 2015 at 12:00 noon Singapore time at (65) 6739 5807.
